name: The Edge (Juan Rodriguez, galvadion, Nickitus, eantonaz, jvolonte)
name_original: The Edge (Juan Rodriguez, galvadion, Nickitus, eantonaz, jvolonte)
description:
The Edge is an arcade game about a zealot flat earther* that yearns to discover the edge of the earth. He will fly a makeshift rocket to achieve this goal, but the resources are limited. Help him reach the edge.

This game was made in 48 hours during the WinterJam 2021 by Jam2Jam following the theme "reach the unreachable".

Credits:
Programming & Game Design - Joaquin Volonte
Programming, Initial Design and 3D Art - Juan Rodriguez
2D Art & Sound Design - Enzo antonaz
Music - Nickitus

* This game or the developers have no association with the Flath Earth Community, the game is intenteded to be a meme.
